title: University 2
sentences: több éve tanít már a tanszéken.
The assistant professor has been teaching at the department for several years.
A serious publication list is required for an associate professor appointment.
The rector is the supreme leader of the university.
The dean is responsible for managing the faculty.
Every scientific article must be published in a peer-reviewed journal.
Plagiarism counts as a serious disciplinary offense.
The PhD student consults with their research supervisor about their research.
nyilvános megvédése a doktori cím feltétele.
The public defense of the dissertation is a condition for the doctoral title.
során a jelöltnek válaszolnia kell az opponensek kérdéseire.
During the defense, the candidate must answer the opponents' questions.
I requested a passive semester this semester due to family reasons.
tartalmazza a hallgatók jogait és kötelezettségeit.
The TVSZ (Academic and Exam Regulations) contains the rights and obligations of students.
The registrar's office (academic office) handles the official affairs of the students.
Az egyetem sikeresen nyert el egy jelentős
The university successfully won a significant research grant.
The journal has a high impact factor.
A dolgozat végén fel kell tüntetni az összes
All citations/references must be listed at the end of the paper.
hozza meg a legfontosabb döntéseket a kar életében.
The faculty council makes the most important decisions in the life of the faculty.
He/she is currently helping with practical teaching as a student assistant.
tanárok csak bizonyos kurzusokat tartanak meg.
Visiting lecturers (hourly teachers) only hold certain courses.
Obtaining an academic degree is the work of many years.
The training plan of the doctoral school is very strict.
The description of every announced subject is included in the course catalog.
lehetősége nyitva áll a hallgatók előtt.
The possibility of deferment is open to students.
Conference participation is important for professional development.
The teaching assistant helps the work of senior lecturers.
No lectures are held during the rector's break.
dictionary:
adjunktus - assistant professor
docens - associate professor
rektor - rector
dékán - dean
lektorált - peer-reviewed
plágium - plagiarism
témavezető - research supervisor
disszertáció - dissertation
védés - defense
passzív félév - passive semester
TVSZ (Tanulmányi és Vizsgaszabályzat) - Academic and Exam Regulations
tanulmányi osztály - registrar's office / academic office
kutatási támogatás - research grant
impakt faktor - impact factor
hivatkozás - citation / reference
kari tanács - faculty council
demonstrátor - student assistant / demonstrator
óraadó - visiting lecturer / hourly teacher
tudományos fokozat - academic degree
doktori iskola - doctoral school
kurzuskatalógus - course catalog
halasztás - deferment
konferencia-részvétel - conference participation
tanársegéd - teaching assistant (entry level academic rank)
rektori szünet - rector's break
